infocard_paragraphs: Welcome to the Head Office of Corporate Shipping Airways.My name is Steve Malcolm and i am the manager of Corporate Shipping Airways.

Corporate Shipping Airways was created by brave Freelancer pilots more than a decade ago, with the aim of establishing distribution relationships even in the darkest corners of space. At the moment, we have been able to build the main office in Coronado system and the intermediate warehouse in Omicron Delta system. We have been able to establish many business relationships with different nationalities who need our services again and again.

Our company is specialized in selling all kinds of mining products, mostly copper, which we also process ourselves and transport them everywhere across space.Our modest base upholds high quality standards and prioritise our customers satisfaction. We hope to build a trusting relationship where majority can find something to their liking and become loyal customers.

Ionic Industries houses the heavy industry operated by Ionic Incorporated in Shikoku. Its main manufactory is a smelter to process the abundant platinum ore found in neighboring Galileo, for use in Kishiro's market-leading electronic products. The station also operates a uranium centrifuge to refine MOX fuel for its own usage and export.
Use guest access password "shop" to access the logistics overview.

"Graves was a slave cage, BMM - the master's whip, and the riches of Dublin - a lure to tempt the gullible into giving up their life's blood for the Kingdom's wealth. We, the sons and daughters of Free Dublin, have seen this. Thousands are crippled, thousands are no longer with us, and every day, more perish to sate the Crown's greed. We hate the old company, we hate the Crown, and now we take up the sword against them. We call on all citizens of Bretonia to join us or get out of our way."

Connacht Depot is an ore processing plant built by the Mollys of the Republican Provisional Assembly as part of their industrial buildup plan for the Dublin system. It is a local hub of industry and serves as a staging point for exporting gold to outsiders. The gold produced here lacks special BMM markings and is considered contraband by the authorities.

Constructed shortly before the destruction of Graves Station, Connacht was initially a disposable platform holding extra gold ore storage silos for wildcat mining ops that the Mollys are known to profit from. However, once Battleship Essex retreated and the Crown's presence in the system waned, the Mollys continued to expand Connacht with extra storage, refineries and living quarters for the crews needed to operate them.

In light of an impending counterattack by the Armed Forces, the station has been fortified, but remains primarily a civilian installation, overseeing operations in the gold fields and sheltering Molly mining ships in need of R&R.
Shop inventory view token is 'mollygold'.

Assembled in orbit of Planet Tuvalu by a joint team of Core technicians and Kusari advisors, Grootegeluk Depot's main objective is the creation of large stocks of foodstuffs ahead of grand explansion plans within nearby systems and in the Colonies.

Its proximity to Planet Nauru, however, has also turned it into the "front store" for rare materials and technology captured in daring expeditions and raids throughout the Edge Worlds, with all available for purchase by those neutral or allied to The Core.
The Konpeki initiative was founded in 829 AS by Vecesco Trebitti, with the help of Adam Hood and Ownes Industries. It is currently owned and operated by NHI.
Based on the standard design of GMG's signature Gas Miner model, the base serves both for storage and research of the Azurite Gas leaking from a nearby Nomad weapons platform.

While the Gas Miner itself has gas mining capabilities, the gas is also harvested by an automated mining drone system. These drones are equipped with a unique "GMK" transponder, corresponding to a controller located aboard Gas Miner Konpeki.
The base offers excess Azurite Gas for sale. New Horizon Industries holds no liability for any injuries or strange side effects that may be caused by Azurite Gas obtained from this installation.
Welcome to the Reincarnation outpost, here you can be safe from the harsh Omicron Delta enviorament.Reincarnation is the advanced fortress of the Deterrence military.

The station have several instalations open to the allies who dock to repair, rearm, and take a rest of the operations in Omicron Delta. The base also serve as an important HUB for Xeno relic processing and managing.
Port construction stage 1. Access denied. The hydroponics systems, heavy water processing plant are being debug
Work producer NordTrans.

-- Welcome to Nebula for Science and Technologies, one of the NSE corporation stations located at the Pennsylvania system. Sara Tanaka, CEO of Nebula Technologies salutes you and wish you a special time onboard our station.
Welcome to Plano Outpost. Please securely stow all weapons before leaving the flight deck. This is a secure station.

Plano Outpost is a recently established Liberty Navy station in far orbit of Planet Houston. The station serves a wide variety of duties including ensuring the safe passage of prison convoys transiting the void between LPI Sugarland and the planet. It also hosts a dockyard of moderate capabilities, acting as an ancillary facility to Norfolk, taking lower priority orders, and when not serving the Liberty Navy, the dockyard is available for contract for civillian projects.

The station is additionally home to a Liberty Navy surplus dealer, "Armed and Defenseless", which sells obsolete materiel dating from as early as the Nomad Wars to corporations and other Liberty forces.
Administrator: Captain Julius Fox, Carrier Oriskany, Deputy Chief Supply Liason for the Reserve Fleet.
Greetings, pilot. Welcome to the Rock. Relax with us and visit our armory. There you can buy guns for your ship.
who wants to help supply the base, password to view: sklad
WELCOME TO TIPPERARY SMELTER
Welcome to Office of Major Ein from Eclipse Vanguard. Have a nice day, My friend. Viewshop password is: "1998".
Here is a Muti-functional orbital station with office, port and production.
We welcome all friendly and nautral individuals or groups to negotiate business cooperation here, we will provide a safe and comfortable negotiation environment.
Ships that have never arrived at the station are required to register in advance at the station's visitor registry.The station will be open to docking permits through a registration system.

Fort Torrelavega is glad to salute you, brave pilot. The imperio deployed this base in order to secure a forwardbase of operations in a contested space like Dublin. The imperio will secure the gold or burn down the enemigos

This Point Of Business belongs to BMF Bretonia Mining and Fabrication wich is the player faction for BMM.Isle of Skye serves as HQ of BMF as well as being its main Hub in New London for trade and development of special equipment and weapons.

Isle of Skye is always producing equipment and for this reasoon we do like to maintain a stock of some rare materials like precious metals or the rarest comodities. We invite every trader to visit our dealership simply give the passphrase VERLOTE to gain access to all our current stocks and pirces, we are sure you will find something profitable at Isle of Skye.
Bretonia Mining and Fabrication invites every trader and miner to visit our space station. If you have some time during your stay you are welcome to visit our famous Tee and Pee Bar.
Isle of Skye, serving the community since 1-8-2016 (823 A.S.)

Kadesh Orbital City was established in 828 A.S. in Palmyra orbit as a modular station as a temporary shelter for Phoenix Zoners per return from the Great Voyage, but by 830 A.S. it was apparent that the station could no longer handle the increased workload and the location was favorable and safe enough to invest resources for a larger project. The question of expanding the station became an urgent one, but the off-the-shelf modular offerings on the market did not fit the specific criteria.

Taking advantage of connections with corporations in core worlds, Phoenix acquired the most appropriate station design blueprints known to the Sirius as Zeus type from Deep Space Engineering and finalized the ready-made design together with Daumann Heavy Construction, taking into account its all settlers and corefleet needs. Construction boiled over and multiple transport ships from Rheinland and Gallia began arriving at the construction site.

As of 832 A.S, per finishing off core works and establishing new Kadesh Orbital City, for now it provides like core worlds comfort to its residents and safe environment. Kadesh has become a remarkable spot in a remote region, serving its original purpose for its settlers, acting as freeport for lone strangers and allies and as attraction for tourists all around Sirius and Gallia, serving like a true city-of-paradise in those edge world badlands.

In light of recent events - the siege of the city by the Nomads and the Freeport 9 crisis caused by the expansion of the Corsairs serious measures have been taken into account. Earlier homeships were moored to the station and were used as housing modules, now almost the entire population of homeships has descended to the Kadesh Orbital City and each of the Nephilim class vessels can be used in open combat. Analysts agreed that many Zoners would consider the city a safe harbor.

Thus the Orontes planet-side colony project was lifted from the archives, as Kadesh was built for a reason in the orbit of the planet Palmyra. The planet had previously been scanned for an atmosphere, a core, and various metals in its interior. But due to the high cost of building Kadesh Orbital City as Zeus type, it is not considered as affordable in the foreseeable future at its best.

Welcome to Kruger Mineraliens Headquater, if you want to trade with us about our Refined Aluminium our current price per Unit is 80 S.C. if you want to check the stock our Shoppassword is /base login shop
-TRADE TIPP- Sell Alu to BPA Newgate 5C Manchester // Buy Copper at Susquehanna Station 4D Cortez - Sell to Mainz Storage Facility in Frankfurt 4D

The Tavern has been successfully acquired by Deep Space Engineering. Negotiations are ongoing regarding the status of existing assets and the IMG workforce. At this time, the base will continue its normal operations under the guidance of nearby Susquehanna Station.
Welcome to the Makerspace, home to the coolest hackers this side of Ontario and the most tooled up workshops in Sirius! Narcs, Corpos and Squares STAY OUT!
//viewshop password: shop

The Jiangnan Shipyard is a Coalition industrial facility located in Tangier orbit. Its construction marks an expansion of the Coalition's industrial capabilities, will allow for more advantageous access to raw materials in the future, and ensure that the sacrifice of the Alvin Katz will not be in vain.
The facility is currently under construction.
The view passward is "shopviewer"
Memphis Industrial is an amalgamation of smelters, refineries, and factories, built and managed by ALG. Its facilities process industrial waste and debris from the region into usable alloys and fuel.
The station serves the industrial needs of the Order in their home system, and anyone friendly to them.
Use the password "shop" to access the shop view as a visitor.

Ravenna Invicta was established in 829 A.S. by Caesar Salazar as Roma Invicta to serve as the capital of the Roman Praetorian Prefecture of Sirius. During this time the base served as a cultural exchange point.

After a short while, seeing that his curiosity about other cultures isn't appealing to the majority of the Corsairs, he gathered his subjects and left Sirius. More details on their exodus are unknown at this time.
Roma Invicta was entrusted to Ravenna Nagash, the Executor of Deterrence, and her Conclave decided to rename it Ravenna Invicta, in her honor, to symbolize her might.
Welcome to Impala Station

Impala is a start-up project made by two brothers, Loto and Kitsu togheter with several workers and contracts,in order to mine, ship, and process platinum. We search to have profits and we are a civilian group that,search no conflict and is open to business with everyone. Thanks for docking, wish you enjoy the stay.
The station is selling Platinum for 80 credits per unit. It also buys Platinum Ore for 65 credits per unit. The password to view the shop is Shiny.
//viewshop password is /Shiny

Welcome to the newest and only Platinum refinery operated in Liberty! Deep Space Engineering takes pride in our miners and haulers who make it possible for YOU to acquire the platinum necessary for your industrial projects.
For business opportunities, contact the station's public neural net node.

The modular dry dock is now operational. Look over our Avionics suite options from the catalogue! To discuss shipbuilding contracts, contact the DSE public relations node. Bulk orders from organizations may be eligible for a discount!
Unity through Trade.

A small free trade depot in Tau-23 run by a group of mixed Gallic and Sirian freelancers. One of the three docking bays appears to be closed to the public, and an unusually large percentage of the guests are Technocrats, Corsicans, or ex-Commonwealth.
The port appears to still be under construction.
Welcome to Xuanming Trade Centre. Samura build this base for trading purpose. Access the shop with key: Khotan
Base Imports & Exports:- Platinum for 80SC and buy Platinum Ore for 45SC.
Base also sell Jump Drive II, III and IV. Order on the Samura Heavy Industries forum.
Ionic Laboratories are an educational, research, and manufacturing facility and headquarters to Ionic Incorporated, a subsidiary of Kishiro Technologies.

The campus offers postgraduate programs in a variety of high technology fields, specializing in particle physics, with the opportunity for students to gain practical experience on-site at the station's production  centers. Ionic manufactures a variety of shipboard high-tech equipment, such as hyperspace tunneling devices and specialized armaments.
Riau Star City is the home of the Kongsi Syndicate, a tight-knit group of insular radicals within the IMG who organize themselves non-hierarchically along anarcho-syndicalist lines.

The syndics (or "syndies", as outsiders often call them) are known to be reclusive, and distrust almost anyone who isn't also affiliated with the Guild -- with the notable exceptions of the IMG's traditional partners in Gateway and the ALG. Outliers exist, however, and the syndics are known to work with freelancers and other flexible parties when it suits them.
To apply for docking or mooring privileges, visit the following neural-net link:
t.ly/O6o-k
Formerly owned by the now-dissolved Constellation Express, the Elcano complex consists of two separate installations functioning as one: this manufacturing complex, and the Elcano Storage Appendix.
The complex serves New Horizon Industries as a factory to mass-produce and distrubute private-label hyperspace traversal technologies, based on NHI proprietary blueprints.
While the source of this technology remains undisclosed, NHI guarantees the quality and effectiveness of all equipment sold on this station.
New Horizon Industries does not guarantee the compatibility of equipment with Sirian or Gallic vessels, nor does the company hold any liability for direct or indirect damage caused by its products.
//viewshop password: shop
Located in orbit of the beautiful Curacao, this modular drydock will serve all your shipbuilding needs while you enjoy a shuttle visit to the planetside resorts.
For business opportunities, contact the station's public neural net node.

The modular dry dock is now operational. Look over our Interior cabin design options from the catalogue! To discuss shipbuilding contracts, contact the DSE public relations node. Bulk orders from organizations may be eligible for a discount!

Med Force Academy is a premier training and teaching hospital, owned and operated by Med Force Enterprises. This unique institution provides specialized training to medical professionals, rescue teams and medical security teams, all united in a mission to serve those in need.

We wish you an enriching and enjoyable stay at Med Force General Academy. Contributions to support our mission are graciously accepted. If you wish to donate, please direct your contribution to [MFE]donations or type: /bank deposit [amount].

Falster Station is a large IMG installation located close to Freistadt within the Omega-7 system. Primarily intended to serve as an ore refinery and secondary trade center, the official commodity dealers sell refined metals, as well as ore harvested directly from the fields, at competitive prices. It is also considered one of the safest places in the Omegas, making it an attractive waystation for the lone traveller.

Falster operates as a "closed freeport", with prior approval required before docking or mooring permissions are granted. This approval is dispensed liberally; as such, shady characters and grey-market dealers can be easily found aboard.
If you wish to apply for docking or mooring access, please visit the following link:
https://t.ly/7TTJB

This Point Of Business belongs to BMF Breetonia Mining and Fabrication, wich is the player faction for BMM. Fortitudine is the main Hub in Bretonia for Gold refiining and trade.This state of the art instalation also produces food rations. This services are available to all customers 24/7.

Fortitudine is any trader best choice for sourcing lawfully obtined Gold. As the public can see by BMF prices and wages. We at BMF dully respect our workforce and strive to change BMM image of worker abuse.After the Galic War, Bretonia Mining and Fabrication was nationalised by the Crown in order to change the public opinion, among the other advantages it would bring to BMM the introduction of a civilian oversight.

Customers will take note of our small service fees needed to maintain the instalation up and running as well as our crew wages and well being. Port-war the BMF board focused on providing the Bretonian civilians with dignif ying work places and wages that could help bring the population back from the economic caos brought about by theGalic War. Fortitudine stands today as a beacon of Bretonia Mining and Fabrication efforts to change BMM publicimage of worker abuse.
Fortitudine, serving the community since 7-27-2014 (821 A.S.)
